name: Everhood
overview: An UNCONVENTIONAL ADVENTURE RPG that takes place in an inexpressible world filled with amusing musical battles and strange delightful encounters. Welcome to the world of Everhood Where up is down And left is right Where time has stopped And strange characters R O A M Here you control a wooden doll whose arm has been stolen by a blue gnome… Features: - Groove to music based battles - Embark on a 5-6 hour journey with many twists and turns - Expect the unexpected - Enter a wild world with visceral visuals accompanied with magical music -Conquer a great challenge that awaits the bold...
